commands.avatar: View your avatar, or someone else's avatar. Just type `avatar` for your avatar, or mention someone for their avatar, eg: `avatar @Silvia923#9909`.
commands.neo: Find out how many Near-Earth objects are near Earth right now.
commands.earth: See live footage of Earth, as seen from the NOAA DSCVRY probe.
commands.meme:
Make a meme, using a variety of templates, in the following way: 
 `meme [template] Top text - Bottom text.` 
 Replace [template] with a template from `meme_templates`. 
 Separate the meme's top and bottom text using a hyphen. 
 To see templates, type `meme_templates`
commands.population: Get the total number of humans on Earth right now.
commands.search: Get all the synonyms for a word.
commands.xkcd: Get a randomized XKCD comic by just typing xkcd and get today's comic by appending today onto your command.
commands.qr:
Generate a QR code to share links/text easily. Any text after the qr command will be encoded in the QR code. 
 For multi-coloured QR codes, use the qr+ command instead.
commands.qr+:
Generate a multi-coloured QR code, using two hex values: qr+ [hex code] [hex code] Text 
 Sample Hex Codes: 572, 828, 0ff, 6a6, 909, fff, 000
commands.acronym: Get the meaning of an acronym.
commands.astronauts: Find out how many astronauts are aboard the International Space Station.
commands.iss:
Get the location of the International Space Station. 
 Updates every second.
commands.pls react: Get a tonload of reactions for no reason. ðŸ‘€ ðŸ¤£ ðŸ˜ƒ ðŸ˜„ ðŸ˜… ðŸ˜† ðŸ˜‰
commands.old-define: Get an old-style definition of a word like it's 1859.
commands.translate:
Translate to a variety of languages, including French (fr), Italian (it), German (de), and more! 
 Add a language code to your query, see the example below.
commands.identify: Identify what language a piece of text is in, plus the result includes Watson AI's confidence levels too!
commands.fmt:
Format your message so that it displays in a certain font or colour, or is encoded in binary, 1337, etc.,. 
 Add a colour from the colour list or a font from the font list below. 
 Colour list: red, blue, yellow, orange. 
 Font List: circular, currency, old, modern, mono 
 Encode List: binary, hexadecimal, 1337, adv1337
commands.pyramid: Convert a sentence into a word pyramid. :eyes:
commands.gift: Send a gift to another user!
commands.sepia: Add a sepia effect to an image (image URLs supported, as well as local images).
commands.imgedit: Add random effects and filters to an image.
commands.emojify: Convert your message into an emojipasta. Adds emojis related to words found within the message.
commands.reverse: Reverse your message. If you received a reversed message, you can apply this command to that message to un-reverse it.
commands.flip: Flip an image, so that its mirror image will be displayed.
commands.emoji: Search for emojis related to a certain search term. Get happy emojis, cute emojis, hearts, etc.
commands.random-case: Randomize every letter in a sentence's case, so iT tUrnS oUt lIke ThIS.
commands.invert: Invert an image, so that it's mirror image is seen.
commands.slowblur: Add a gentler blur effect to an image.
commands.extremeblur: Add a stronger blur effect to an image.
commands.dotify: Add this cool effect to an image.
commands.setPresence: Change the bot's playing/presence message to another message (not user-defined).
commands.letter-em: Convert all the letters in a message to emoji letters.
commands.replace-b: Replace all the b's in a message with the :b: emoji.
commands.fx: Combine two samples together, and then listen to the result.
commands.build: A sample/loop you can play. For more samples, type `-music_cmds`
commands.riser: A sample/loop you can play. For more samples, type `-music_cmds`
commands.music_cmds: Provides a list of samples/loops you can play.
commands.captcha: Transform a piece of plaintext into a captcha. :eyes:
commands.name: Get stats on your first name, such as how many people share your first name, etc.,
commands.rhyme: Get words that rhyme with a word of your choice.
commands.photo: Get public domain, stunning images from Unsplash.
commands.yt: Search YouTube for videos. Just add a search query after your command.
commands.ask: Ask Onyx anything, and she'll provide an answer from Wolfram|Alpha, an information engine.
commands.define: Get a definition of a word.
commands.pixabay: Search Pixabay for public domain, stunning images.
commands.ascii-faces: Get a ton of super cute copy-and-paste Ascii Faces (â—•â€¿â—•)  Ê•Â´â€¢á´¥â€¢`Ê”
commands.cats: Get a ton of super cute cat ascii faces (*^Ï‰^*) (^äºº^)
commands.poll: Create a poll. Just append a question onto your command, and the reactions will symbolise votes.
commands.server: Get server stats, such as member count, when the server was created, and more...
commands.info: Get info. about Onyx, such as what language she's coded in, and more. :eyes:
commands.creator: Get info. on who coded Onyx :eyes:
commands.idea:
Submit an idea for a new bot feature :eyes: 
Tips: Try to be specific, if you can. No NSFW commands can be accepted. 
 I'm looking forward to seeing what you come up with. Who knows, your idea just might become reality someday.
commands.invite: Get Onyx's invite link, so that she can be invited to other servers.
commands.word2gif: Translate words to GIPHY GIFS. Use the power of GIFS to convey your message.
commands.word2sticker: Translate words to GIPHY stickers. Get GIPHY Stickers related to your search terms (uses different algorithm to `sticker` command).
commands.trending-gif: Get a trending GIPHY GIF that's hot online now.
commands.meme_templates: Get a list of all meme templates. :eyes:

examples.meme_examples: meme waitingskeleton This is top text-This is bottom text
examples.qr_examples: qr This message is now encoded as a QR code
examples.translate_examples:
translate fr How are you doing? 
 translate es The weather is beautiful today. 
 translate de Seize the day.
examples.identify_examples:
identify Hello there, how are you? 
 identify Bonjour, la vie est belle.
examples.fmt_examples:
fmt binary this is in binary 
 fmt mono this is in monospaced font 
 fmt red This message is displayed in red.
examples.random-case_examples: randomCase this is a sample sentence
examples.emojify_examples: emojify I love emojis, they're pretty fun to use.
examples.letter-em_examples: letter-em All these letters will turn into letter emojis
examples.captcha_examples: captcha This text is now a captcha
examples.ask_examples:
ask Who won Best Actress award at Oscars 2016
-ask What is the average velocity of an airplane
examples.idea_examples: idea New image filters please! Would love to see some sepia filters :eyes:
examples.poll_examples: poll Do you want more text channels?
